member.name: T:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Bind.SequenceActionsCommand
member.summary: Set sequence numbers for all the actions and create symbols in the output object.
Sequence an action before or after a standard action.
member.param: The action symbol to be sequenced.
Collection of actions which must be included.
A dictionary used for detecting cyclic references among action symbols.

member.summary: Check the specified action symbol to see if it leads to a cycle.
member.para: Use the provided dictionary to note the initial action symbol that first led to each action symbol. Any action symbol encountered that has already been encountered starting from a different initial action symbol inherits the loop characteristics of that initial action symbol, and thus is also not part of a cycle. However, any action symbol encountered that has already been encountered starting from the same initial action symbol is an indication that the current action symbol is part of a cycle.
member.param: The action symbol to be checked.
Collection of actions which must be included.
The first encountered action symbol that led to each action symbol.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Bind.SequenceActionsCommand.GetParentActionSymbol(WixToolset.Data.Symbols.WixActionSymbol,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,WixToolset.Data.Symbols.WixActionSymbol})
member.summary: Get the action symbol that is the parent of the given action symbol.
member.param: Collection of actions which must be included.
member.returns: Null if there is no parent. Used for loop termination.

member.summary: Applies the condition and relative sequence to an action element based on the action row data.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.EnsureProperty(System.String)
member.summary: Ensure that a particular property exists in the decompiled output.
member.returns: The property element.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizeCheckBoxTable(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.remarks: Enumerates through all the Control rows, looking for controls of type "CheckBox" with a value in the Property column. This is then possibly matched up with a CheckBox row to retrieve a CheckBoxValue. There is no foreign key from the Control to CheckBox table.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizeComponentTable(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.remarks: Set the keypaths for each component.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizeDialogTable(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.remarks: Sets the first, default, and cancel control for each dialog and adds all child control elements to the dialog.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizeDuplicateMoveFileTables(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.summary: Finalize the DuplicateFile and MoveFile tables.
member.remarks: Sets the source/destination property/directory for each DuplicateFile or MoveFile row.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizeFeatureComponentsTable(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.remarks: Since tables specifying references to the FeatureComponents table have references to the Feature and Component table separately, but not the FeatureComponents table specifically, the FeatureComponents table and primary features must be decompiled during finalization.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizeFileTable(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.remarks: Sets the source, diskId, and assembly information for each file.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizeMIMETable(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.remarks: There is a foreign key shared between the MIME and Extension tables so either one would be valid to be decompiled first, so the only safe way to nest the MIME elements is to do it during finalize.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizeProgIdTable(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.remarks: Enumerates through all the Class rows, looking for child ProgIds (these are the default ProgIds for a given Class). Then go through the ProgId table and add any remaining ProgIds for each Class. This happens during finalize because there is a circular dependency between the Class and ProgId tables.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizePropertyTable(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.remarks: Removes properties that are generated from other entries.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizeRemoveFileTable(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.remarks: Sets the directory/property for each RemoveFile row.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizePermissionsTable(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection,System.String)
member.summary: Finalize the LockPermissions or MsiLockPermissionsEx table.
member.remarks: Nests the Permission elements below their parent elements. There are no declared foreign keys for the parents of the LockPermissions table.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizeLockPermissionsTable(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.remarks: Nests the Permission elements below their parent elements. There are no declared foreign keys for the parents of the LockPermissions table.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizeMsiLockPermissionsExTable(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.remarks: Nests the PermissionEx elements below their parent elements. There are no declared foreign keys for the parents of the MsiLockPermissionsEx table.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizeSearchTables(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.remarks: Does all the complex linking required for the search tables.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizeShortcutTable(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.remarks: Sets Advertise to yes if Target points to a Feature. Occurs during finalization because it has to check against every feature row.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizeSequenceTables(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.remarks: Creates the sequence elements. Occurs during finalization because its not known if sequences refer to custom actions or dialogs during decompilation.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizeUpgradeTable(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.remarks: Decompile the rows from the Upgrade and LaunchCondition tables created by the MajorUpgrade element.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Core.WindowsInstaller.Decompile.Decompiler.FinalizeVerbTable(WixToolset.Data.WindowsInstaller.TableIndexedCollection)
member.remarks: The Extension table is a foreign table for the Verb table, but the foreign key is only part of the primary key of the Extension table, so it needs special logic to be nested properly.

member.summary: Get the path to a file in the source image.
